pages.text: Native to the fabled Mushroom Islands, these colorful beetles live peaceably alongside mooshrooms.$(br2)Adult beetles care for their young, protecting and feeding them until their shells harden.$(br2)The color of their carapace is thought to be influenced by the naturally occurring pigments present in their mushroom-based diet.

pages.title: Colelytra
pages.text: $(o)Author's note: special thanks to $(l)@Atlan$()$(o), who first chronicled this marvelous beast!
